<h3 id="X38072">X(38072) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(2), X(4), X(6)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-10*(b^2+c^2)*a^4+(5*b^4-18*b^2*c^2+5*c^4)*a^2+4*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>
X(38072) = 4*X(2)-X(1350) = X(2)+2*X(5480) = X(4)+2*X(597) = 4*X(5)-X(599) = 8*X(5)+X(11477) = 2*X(5)+X(20423) = X(6)+2*X(381) = 5*X(6)+4*X(3818) = X(6)-4*X(5476) = 7*X(6)+2*X(18440) = X(6)+8*X(19130) = 5*X(381)-2*X(3818) = X(381)+2*X(5476) = 7*X(381)-X(18440) = X(381)-4*X(19130) = X(399)-4*X(25566) = 2*X(599)+X(11477) = X(599)+2*X(20423) = X(1350)+8*X(5480) = X(11477)-4*X(20423)
</b>
<p>
X(38072) lies on these lines: {2,1350}, {4,597}, {5,599}, {6,13}, {30,5085}, {69,32893}, {141,5071}, {154,23049}, {182,3830}, {262,5503}, {373,32216}, {376,3589}, {382,10541}, {511,5055}, {515,38023}, {516,38088}, {517,38087}, {518,38021}, {519,38035}, {524,3545}, {527,38143}, {528,38147}, {529,38148}, {547,3763}, {549,31670}, {575,3843}, {576,3851}, {971,38086}, {1351,11178}, {1352,5066}, {1503,3839}, {1656,25565}, {1992,3091}, {2453,16279}, {2781,5640}, {2829,38090}, {2882,13240}, {3053,37345}, {3090,20582}, {3098,15694}, {3124,9759}, {3524,29181}, {3534,10168}, {3543,3618}, {3564,38071}, {3584,10387}, {3751,30308}, {3832,8550}, {3845,11179}, {3855,20583}, {5050,11645}, {5052,18362}, {5054,19924}, {5068,11160}, {5072,34507}, {5073,20190}, {5092,15681}, {5096,28444}, {5182,11317}, {5587,28538}, {5603,9041}, {5621,31861}, {5842,38091}, {5845,38073}, {5846,38074}, {5847,38076}, {5848,38077}, {5849,38078}, {6144,18358}, {6811,13783}, {6813,13663}, {7394,17809}, {7426,31860}, {7540,37476}, {7565,34117}, {7610,9753}, {8176,14645}, {8584,11180}, {9752,15597}, {9755,10033}, {9830,14639}, {10249,37077}, {10601,31133}, {10706,16010}, {11163,13862}, {11284,13857}, {11482,18553}, {11801,25336}, {12017,15684}, {13626,15162}, {13627,15163}, {13632,37499}, {14787,17834}, {14810,15701}, {14892,34380}, {15688,29317}, {15689,17508}, {15703,33878}, {15709,21167}, {16226,34146}, {17825,31152}, {18382,19132}, {18405,19153}, {20126,32271}, {22236,37332}, {22238,37333}, {28194,38047}, {28198,38167}, {28208,38029}</p>
<p>
X(38072) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {381, 14848}, {3545, 14853}, {5050, 14269}<br>
X(38072) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (6, 14848), (10516, 3545), (14848, 5476), (15689, 17508), (21358, 5055), (31884, 5054), (38064, 38079)<br>
X(38072) = Kiepert-hyperbola-inverse of X(15484)<br>
X(38072) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (5, 20423, 599), (13, 14, 15484), (381, 5476, 6), (382, 25555, 10541), (599, 20423, 11477), (1351, 11178, 15533), (1351, 19709, 11178), (3845, 11179, 36990), (3845, 18583, 11179), (5476, 19130, 381), (10516, 14853, 5102), (14561, 38064, 38079), (38035, 38146, 38144)<br>
</p>
